author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Heat the olive oil in a non-stick frying pan and sauté the onion for a few minutes, to soften.  Add the chicken pieces and fry until browned. Stir in the chorizo and paprika and heat for a few minutes. Pour in the double cream and stir. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Meanwhile, mix the cooked rice, cooked peas and vegetable oil in a bowl.  To serve, spoon the cooked rice onto a serving plate and serve the chicken and chorizo dish alongside.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, peeled and diced,  ½ chicken breast, cut into bite-sized cubes,  55g/2oz chorizo, sliced,  1 tsp paprika,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  200g/8oz freshly cooked rice,  100g/4oz peas, cooked,  1 tbsp vegetable oil
